green_screen module¶

green_screen.check_dimensions_compability(video_object: cv2.VideoCapture, image_array: numpy.ndarray) → None¶

Function to check if sizes of both inputs match

Parameters

  • video_object (cv2.VideoCapture) – video stream of cv2 library

  • image_array (np.ndarray) – image stream as numpy array

Raises

Exception – If dimensions mismatch, then exception raises

green_screen.main()¶

Main function to run the script

green_screen.replace_background_cv2(frame: numpy.ndarray, image: numpy.ndarray, lower_boundary: numpy.ndarray, upper_boundary: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Cv2-based implementation of background replacement

Parameters

  • frame (np.ndarray) – Single frame to adjust

  • image (np.ndarray) – New background

  • lower_boundary (np.ndarray) – Lower boundary of HSL colour to remove

  • upper_boundary (np.ndarray) – Upper boundary of HSL colour to remove

Returns

Adjusted frame

Return type

np.ndarray

green_screen.replace_background_self(frame: numpy.ndarray, image: numpy.ndarray, lower_boundary: numpy.ndarray, upper_boundary: numpy.ndarray) → numpy.ndarray¶

Self-implemented background replacement

Parameters

  • frame (np.ndarray) – Single frame to adjust

  • image (np.ndarray) – New background

  • lower_boundary (np.ndarray) – Lower boundary of BGR colour to remove

  • upper_boundary (np.ndarray) – Upper boundary of BGR colour to remove

Returns

Adjusted frame

Return type

np.ndarray

green_screen.replace_background_with_image(video: str, image: str, removal_function: Callable, lower_boundary: numpy.ndarray = array([36, 0, 0]), upper_boundary: numpy.ndarray = array([86, 255, 255])) → None¶

Function which replaces green background with given image. Uncomment lines for visual output

Parameters

  • video (str) – File name of video with green background

  • image (str) – File name of new background

  • removal_function (Callable) – Chosen function for replacing the background

  • lower_boundary (np.ndarray, optional) – Lower boundary of chosen colour model to remove. Defaults to COLOR_BOUNDARIES[‘LOWER_GREEN_HSV’].

  • upper_boundary (np.ndarray, optional) – Upper boundary of chosen colour model to remove. Defaults to COLOR_BOUNDARIES[‘UPPER_GREEN_HSV’].
